    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the game loop.

      • updateScreen

        private void updateScreen()
        Updates the game screen each tick. If the game window gets resized, resizes the virtual terminal to fit.

      • drawMenuItems

        private void drawMenuItems()
        Draws the Menu Text centered on the screen.

      • selectNextMenuItem

        public void selectNextMenuItem(int mod)
        Selects the next menu item and highlights it.
        Parameters:
        mod - if positive 1 moves up the list, if -1 moves down the list

      • executeCurrentItem

        public void executeCurrentItem(GameWindow window,
                      AbstractState state)
        executes the currently selected menu item on the game window.
        Parameters:
        window - the window on which the item is being executed
        state - the (abstract)state requesting execution.
